title: Internet Resilience, Part 2: What It Takes to ?Just Work?
description: One of the greatest signs of the success of the internet as a technology is how little the average person thinks about it. I?m not talking about the content itself. The streaming videos, online shopping sites, news and educational content, workplace productivity tools, and many other pieces of content we view and interact with online garner a great deal of attention. I?m instead talking about what?s involved in getting that content delivered reliably, quickly, and securely to a device.
author: James Kretchmar
